tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  income DECIMAL(10, 2),
  location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  email_address VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_groups (
  group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  group_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_messages (
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  message_content TEXT,
  group_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (group_id) REFERENCES customer_groups(group_id)
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerDemographics (
    customer_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    income INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerSegments (
    segment_id INT,
    segment_name VARCHAR,
    description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (segment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MarketingMessages (
    message_id INT,
    message_content TEXT,
    segment_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (message_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES CustomerSegments(segment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MessageDeliveries (
    delivery_id INT,
    message_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    delivery_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (delivery_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES MarketingMessages(message_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerDemographics(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE MarketingMessages (message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_content VARCHAR,
    message_type VARCHAR,
    group_id INT REFERENCES CustomerGroups(group_id));

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE CampaignResponses (response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id),
    customer_id INT REFERENCES Customers(customer_id),
    response_date TIMESTAMP
    response_content VARCHAR);
